column4: anyone else lost their synaptic touchpad after upgrading to breezy?
but it still works as a trackpad?
it may give you some help
it says it can't open my ps2 port (/dev/psaux) ... what does that mean?
ah... it says Found Synaptics Touchpad\nFirmware: 8.96 (multiple-byte mode).
tpconfig -i tells me all the good stuff... looks perfect. why isn't x failing to recognize my synaptics touchpad?
I have a similar touchpad, also not working - although I didn't configure it in hoary.
I'll see if I can get it working, and let you know
cool... I'm just out of ideas here... seems like it should be working at this point
Okay. I've verified that the synaptics driver is *loaded* on mine.
